main event: A researcher observed a bright yellow-white object in the sky that changed to orange while moving into the valley in Rangeley, Maine on January 5th.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a pen at arm's length., The observation lasted for about 15 minutes., The object appeared to shimmer like a star and changed its brightness., Weather conditions at the time were not clear from the report., The researcher was observing the sky as part of their routine research into atmospheric optics.
sighted object: a bright yellow-white object changing to orange
witness description: a 37-year-old male researcher in Natural Science, specializing in Cosmic Orgone Energy
